plot outline: Hunja movie is based on innocent boy how he is targeted by the friends. Innocent is framed for murder he has not done and his sacrifice is also interesting. He loses his memory recoup it in a hospital and again fights for his rights. And also how the friendship of Mugda is misused and revenge saga takes place is well narrated.
title: Hunja
